articles.title: How Investors May Respond To Comcast (CMCSA) Saudi Theme Park Plans And New Co-CEO Structure
articles.mainIdea: How Investors May Respond To Comcast (CMCSA) Saudi Theme Park Plans And New Co-CEO Structure
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: How Investors May Respond To Comcast (CMCSA) Saudi Theme Park Plans And New Co-CEO Structure. Earlier in December, Comcast’s Universal Studios entered early-stage planning for a multibillion-dollar theme park in Saudi Arabia while Comcast also filed amended articles of incorporation removing obsolete preferred stock references and completed a network expansion to nearly 22,000 locations in Connecticut’s Litchfield County. The company also announced Michael J. Cavanagh’s appointment as Co-CEO from January 2026 and deepened its cloud gaming and managed services reach through Amazon... Related tickers mentioned: CMCSA, CMCSV.

articles.title: 12 Days of Christmas? 12 Stocks That Are Gifts for 2026.
articles.mainIdea: 12 Days of Christmas? 12 Stocks That Are Gifts for 2026.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: 12 Days of Christmas? 12 Stocks That Are Gifts for 2026.. Barron’s looked at the group of stocks and used Wall Street ratings and price targets by sector to find presents for any type of investor. Nvidia Amazon, and Microsoft shares are loved by the Street, with a Buy rating from more than 90% of the analysts covering them. The average Buy-rating ratio for stocks in the Russell 1000 is currently about 58%. Related tickers mentioned: ALK, MSFT, NVDA.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Jay Woods Picks His Favorite And Least Favorite Magnificent 7 Stocks For 2026 – 'A Story To Watch'
articles.mainIdea: EXCLUSIVE: Jay Woods Picks His Favorite And Least Favorite Magnificent 7 Stocks For 2026 – 'A Story To Watch'
articles.summary: Benzinga: EXCLUSIVE: Jay Woods Picks His Favorite And Least Favorite Magnificent 7 Stocks For 2026 – 'A Story To Watch'. The Magnificent Seven stocks continue to be among the most closely followed by investors, analysts and market experts. In an interview with Benzinga, Freedom Capital Markets Chief Market Strategist Jay Woods shares his favorite Magnificent 7 stocks heading into 2026 and which of the seven he's avoiding. Favorite Magnificent 7 Stocks During an interview with Benzinga in September 2025, Woods said to stick with what was working when it came to big tech stocks and the Magnificent 7 stocks heading i Related tickers mentioned: GOOG.
